type.name: org.gradle.tooling.ResultHandler
type.description: * A handler for an asynchronous operation which returns an object of type T. * * @param <T> The result type. * @since 1.0-milestone-3

method.name: onComplete
method.description: * Handles successful completion of the operation. * * @param result the result * @since 1.0-milestone-3

method.name: onFailure
method.description: * Handles a failed operation. This method is invoked once only for a given operation. * * @param failure the failure * @since 1.0-milestone-3
